website_summaries.verdict: This double breast pump is simple to use and won't break your budget.
pros: Features an anti-backflow design that ensures milk travels directly into a bottle
Boasts 4 operating modes and 16 suction levels to provide optimal comfort
Pump is very quiet, ensuring you can use it without having to worry about excessive noise
Offers an LED touch screen that takes the guesswork out of using the pump
cons: Delivers minimal power and suction in comparison to similar double breast pumps

customer_reviews.title: So far, very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by this pump! I used it last night for the first time. I yielded 8.5oz AFTER a full day of full nursing. That is more than I get with my Spectra S2. There are like 42 million parts so it takes some time to clean and I’m still trying to figure out how to carry the pump it’s self so that I will actually be hands free, otherwise I can’t think of any downsides. The suction is good. It’s pretty quiet. The machine it’s self is very compact and lightweight. While there are a ton of pieces, it’s easy to assemble. Overall pretty happy so far. I’ll update again in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie W

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump because I wasnt responding to a manual. Just starting back to work and I needed something that didnt have to be plugged in to use. This is pretty quiet, very compact and easy to use. The silicone insert is comfortable and helps with quick letdowns. I do have to charge it every day, but the battery lasts me all day and I do two long sessions (25 mins) and one short session of 5-10 mins. I would buy again if I needed another one.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This honestly wasn't my first choicre, but it should have been. It arrived quickly, took only a few days. Real easy to use and is lightweight and easy to take on the go. I bought it as a gift for my sister, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Double Breast Pump
customer_reviews.text: Great product. This product was easy to use for my daughter. Once she got the hang of it, there was no problem. The bottles that came with it weren't exactly adaptable for a newborn though. So instead, she expressed the milk into a bag and poured it into a bottle made for a newborn. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn’t hold a charge or work after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after only a few weeks of use. It no longer holds a charge and a burning smell is coming from it when it’s turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Annie F

customer_reviews.title: great little pump.
customer_reviews.text: this pump is great. it's much smaller than our old one. baby mama said it's easy to use and it felt better because the cups are made with soft material.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great for work
customer_reviews.text: I love that the battery lasts long. It hAs amazing speeds and is great for work
customer_reviews.author: Lala Shala

customer_reviews.title: Great pump
customer_reviews.text: Great pump! Small enough to carry enough and powerful enough to pump with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Samirah

customer_reviews.title: Great pump!
customer_reviews.text: Suction is great, not to hard or too soft. The look and feel is really nice. My only complaint is after pumping, maybe a swallow of milk is held up inside the pump, so you need to unscrew the pump/bottle lid and dump the pump before attempting to dump the bottle for storage, otherwise you will lose some of that precious gold and kick yourself every time you waste a sip like I do. Overall is a great pump. Thx
customer_reviews.author: JordanD

customer_reviews.title: So impressed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed by this little pump! I use the spectra 2 at home, but needed a pump to use while I am on the road, and away from home. This pump is just as good if not better as the $250 one I have at home. It’s lightweight and tiny! It easily fits in my diaper bag and it’s very discreet. If you’re on a budget, if you don’t want a giant pump, or you need something that’s light weight to carry around with you I highly recommend this pump!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: It works well. No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I like the automatic expression setting to begin as it slowly brings you up to the level you want to reach. Then as soon as I get to the level I want, I switch over to normal expression mode and leave it for as long as I need. I am pumping as I type this review. (I have a hands free pumping bra holding it). Easily assembled, small for easy travel. A bit loud but its my first pump so I have nothing to compare it to. I couldn't do this in my work cube without bothering others though.
customer_reviews.author: P. Doty

customer_reviews.title: Very compact and easy
customer_reviews.text: I got this today i couldn't wait to try it. Its pretty compact, has a lot of parts to clean but that's no big deal. The Buttons are a little sensitive very easy to use. I pump while driving so this well be helpful. The Cords are not bulky
customer_reviews.author: Thai

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt worth my money
customer_reviews.text: The sucker is really small for big boobs, plus, was really hard to turn it on, i have to push 10 times before to turn it on, the same for turn off, and sometimes turns on by any movement i make wish is scary
customer_reviews.author: Kary

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Barely any suction even on the highest setting. Had to practically mash it against my chest and roughly hold it there to get any of the suction at all. Great battery life, but doesn't really matter if it doesn't really do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Dax

customer_reviews.title: Overall pretty great pump
customer_reviews.text: This product is super light weight, which is awesome to be able to walk around the house & pump at the same time! I also love how it’s rechargeable, so I don’t have to sit near an outlet, and there’s less cords. I only wish it had more powerful suction so my pumping sessions don’t have to be so long, and there’s so many parts to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Elaina Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This pump is very easy to set up. It comes with several modes and is not that loud. Suction may be lost at times, and its not as strong as it could be unfortunately. I like that it charges, making it easy to transport to pump. Not having to look for an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Neidine Laurenceau

customer_reviews.title: A pretty good pump for the price
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty well! I didn’t pump very much but when I did need to this worked just fine. Probably not the best for exclusively pumping mamas but if you’re just pumping sometimes this one is good!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Schablin

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Only 2 weeks in, only works while plugged in, doesn't charge and now hasl a burning smell!! Totalt fraud!!!
customer_reviews.author: Luz jimenez

customer_reviews.title: It's actually not quiet
customer_reviews.text: Not quiet and I never had another electrical pump to compare to, but this is pretty loud and my daughter hates noise so I use it sparingly when I can
customer_reviews.author: anngroteske

customer_reviews.title: Super low suction
customer_reviews.text: It has 16 levels but it’s super slow suction, you’ll be there all day to get a good amount of milk! The speed needs to be amped up!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C

customer_reviews.title: A good choice !
customer_reviews.text: This was my first breast pump and it was easy to understand and put together although there are multiple parts.
customer_reviews.author: Apiffany

customer_reviews.title: Easy Breast Pump
customer_reviews.text: Well I've just received my pump, from the 1st try i found it light in wight, easy to carry and have modes and different suctioning powers, still i am preparing to welcome the baby and having a breast pump is cleared from my list.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hakouz

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It was a good pump, but it had these dimples in the flange that my milk would collect in and none of it went into the bottles.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaDean

customer_reviews.title: Love the settings, but doesn’t last to long
customer_reviews.text: Had great suction but within a few weeks of me using it stopped working properly and I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Tazia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but LEAKS
customer_reviews.text: The pump is comfortable and performs nicely- however, IT LEAKS SO BAD. I have torn this product apart and put it back together in hopes of the issue going away, but nothing I’ve tried prevents the leaking where the breast cone attaches to the bottle part and milk is constantly getting between the plastic and removable silicone that makes the cone. I dump about half an ounce onto myself or the floor every time. This isn’t going to work while I travel or when I need to pump at 2am.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Coen

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: this pump is very light and easy to take to work. the design is also good.
customer_reviews.author: rob504

product_meta.title: Double Breast Pump – Electric Breast Pump with 4 Modes and 16 Adjustable Suction Levels, USB Charging Quiet Breast Pump Kit with Two Hygienic Milk Bottles, Hands Free, Pump Anytime Anywhere
product_meta.description:
Smart Automatic Mode
The automatic mode is the default mode. The suction level will gradually strengthen from 1 to 14 automatically. The frequency of suction will decrease as the intensity of suction increase in this mode. The automatic setting saves you time of frequently switching modes and changing suction levels. 

Memory Function
This function is only for massage mode, stimulation mode and expression mode. The intelligent breast pump could memorize you last setting of these modes. You don’t have to set the modes or suction levels again and again.

16 Adjustable Suction Levels
In every mode of the Babytec breast pump, there are 16 suction levels to choose. The frequency of suction decreases and the intensity of suction increases as the suction level goes up. We suggest you start with the lowest level and gradually goes to the most comfortable level for yourself. The flexibility of suction level help mom reaches the maximum comfort of breast pumping and the production of breast milk.

LED Touchable Screen
The Babytec breast pump is equipped with a large LED touchable screen. You can clearly see the status of the pumping, such as which mode you choose and what the suction level is, especially useful at time. The touchable screen is sensitive for fingers, you can easily change the setting by softly touch the simple buttons.

100% Safe Material
The whole body of the Babytec breast pump is made of BPA free material which is safe both for babies and moms. The material is suitable for sterilization by high temperature, ultraviolet ray irradiation and chemical agent disinfection. The product could also be completely disassembled and cleaned with no dead ends. The Babytec breast pump ensures every drop of breast milk in the bottle is safe and hygienic.
feature_bullets: BPA FREE MATERIAL – The Babytec breast pump adopts a closed system. The anti-backflow design lets breast milk go directly into the bottle instead of into the tube and motor. Prevents contamination.
4 MODES AND 16 SUCTION – You can choose the number of suctions per minute and intensity. You can start with the massage or stimulation mode to promote breast dredging and stimulate milk secretion.

SUPER QUIET PUMP – Using this low-noise breast pump, you won’t worry about waking your baby when pumping during a nap or bedtime. Our breast pump offers quiet pumping experience without disturbing your family or your colleague.
EASY TO USE – Big LED touchable screen makes mom able to clearly see the status of their pumping, especially useful at night. Double breast pump could be completely disassembled and cleaned.

PUMP ANYWHERE ANYTIME – This breast pump adopts a compact design which makes it portable and easy to carry. This USB charging breast pump is equipped with a big capacity lithium battery. 24-month warranty includes Parts & labor.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars49 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
